subject: Attention Please.
body:
Attention Please.
We are here to notify you that Series of meetings have been held this
week with the Secretary General of the U.N, It is obvious
that you have not received your fund which is now in the amount of
(USD$25.5Million) as a compensation award to you, due to past corrupt
Government Officials who almost held your fund to themselves for their
selfish reasons and some individuals who have taken advantage of your
fund all in an attempt to swindle your fund which has led to
unnecessary delay in the receipt and so many losses.
The National Central Bureau, enhanced by the U.N and FBI have
successfully finalized a plan to boost the exercise of clearing all
foreign debts owed to you who have been found not to have received
their Compensation Awards. How would you like to receive your payment?
Because we have three methods of payment which are by Check or by ATM
card or bank direct transfer or by online banking:
Note: Everything has been taken care of,Tax, Custom Paper
and Clearance Duty. So, 
all you will ever need to pay is $500.00 usd.
Note that you have been advised to urgently proceed to the Stores and
send the only required fee of 500.00 usd through Gift Card like ITUNES
CARD /STEAM WALLET  or if you can send through BITCOIN do let me know.
Get back to us as well with the Copy of Gift Card and also be advised
to reconfirm your full Details 
.Apply Your Claims Promptly: For
immediate release of your fund valued at USD$25.5Million) to you.
Your Full Name:
Your House Address:
Home/Cell/Phone Number:
Your Preferable Payment Method:
Your FUNDS will be to you within 2 working days upon Confirmation of
the fee of $500 usd, We are so sure of everything and we are giving you
a 100% Money back Guarantee if you do not receive payment/ package
within the next 48hrs after you have made the payment.
 Note That
Because Of Impostors, We Hereby Issued You Our Code Of Conduct, Which
Is (FBN202YATM) So You Have To Indicate This Code When replying back
to us By Using It As Your Subject.
Thanks and God bless you
Yours in Service,
Dr.Jimmy Caleb

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
Hello Caleb,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in notifying me about the situation regarding my fund. It's unfortunate that some corrupt officials have caused delays and losses in the process.

I'm interested in learning more about the three methods of payment you mentioned - by check, by ATM, and through clearance duty. Could you please provide more details on each option? How do they work, and what are the advantages of each method?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the National Central Bureau and its collaboration with the FBI. How exactly are they involved in clearing foreign debts owed to individuals like myself? What measures have been put in place to ensure a smooth and secure transaction?

Regarding the required fee of USD, could you explain why it is necessary? Is there any way to waive or reduce this fee? Also, I'm curious about how sending a gift card like iTunes or Steam Wallet would facilitate the payment process. Could you clarify how that works?

Lastly, before proceeding further, I would appreciate it if you could confirm my full details that you have on record. This will help ensure accuracy throughout the process.

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ashley

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
I believe you have gone through my email and you have understood some of
what was stated on it.first if you want to abide by the rules or procedures
of the release of your fund you should know that you have to provide your
personal details to us,so as to enable us confirm if we are writing the
original beneficiary of this fund.again the options or methods in which we
mapped out now for the release of your fund are as follow,1) ATM card,2)
check,3bank transfer and Lastly by online bank.so do not miss understand me
because am here to help you.moreover,the fee you are talking of is not much
if you know the amount or the value of the fund you will receive.more
importantly,all the governmental authorities I have mentioned are talking
drastic measures to end issues of scam around the world,so you shouldn't be
surprised on how they get involved in this case.again the methods of paying
the fee through gift card such as itunes card or apple or steam are the
most easiest way we receive payment without any form of delay,so don't be
confused in any of that.i will be waiting for your positive responds.
Remember to reconfirm your current residence address, your mobile phone
number and also tell me the methods you want to receive your fund.remember
all methods are all advantageous.

Sincerely,
Jimmy caleb

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
Hello Jimmy Caleb,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to help and provide information regarding the release of my funds. I understand that there are certain rules and procedures that need to be followed in order to proceed with the process.

Could you please clarify what personal details you require from me? I want to make sure that I provide the correct information for verification purposes.

Additionally, you mentioned two options for the release of my funds - ATM transfer and online. Could you please explain how each method works and what steps are involved?

I also noticed that you mentioned a fee. Can you please provide more details about this fee? How much is it exactly, and what is it for?

Lastly, could you explain why gift cards such as iTunes, Apple, or Steam are used as a method of payment? How does this ensure a secure transaction?

I look forward to your response and thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Ashley

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
Attention please Ashley,
The methods are as follow,
1) your current home address,2) your phone number,3) your full name.again
if you want to receive it by ATM card,we are going to deliver your fund
through ATM card with it pin code which you can withdraw money with in any
ATM machine in your country.then through bank you need to provide your Bank
details where your fund can be deposited.on the method of payment through
gift cards,we receive payment through apple card or steam or iTunes and we
convert it into money and it very secure and faster than bank payment which
will take more time to get into our account which may delay the release of
your fund.but if you wish to pay the fee through bank account or western
union I will provide the information but it will take more time than
through gift card.

Sincerely,
Jimmy caleb

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
Hi Jimmy Caleb,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I appreciate your willingness to help. Can you please provide more details about the methods you mentioned? How does receiving the funds through an ATM card work? And what are the steps involved in using a gift card or making a payment through Apple Card or Steam?

I'm interested in understanding the process better before proceeding. Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ashley

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
How it works is this, after you have provided your home address where your
ATM will be delivered to and your phone number,our delivery agent will come
to your home and deliver it to you.for the payment through steam wallet or
apple gift card,you have to go to apple store and purchase the gift card
and send it to me after that the delivery process will begin
immediately.the total fee is $500 only, nothing More.
Your phone number is important because the delivery agent has to call you
when he got to your city to avoid wrong delivery.
Sincerely,
Jimmy caleb

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
Hello Jimmy Caleb,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this information. I appreciate your explanation of how the delivery process works. Just to clarify, you mentioned that I would need to provide my home address for the ATM delivery. Could you please let me know how long it usually takes for the ATM to be delivered once the payment is made through the steam wallet or apple gift card?

Additionally, I understand that providing my phone number is important for the delivery agent to contact me when they reach my city. Is there any specific reason why the payment needs to be made through a gift card instead of other methods like online banking or credit card?

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Ashley

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
the reason is that sending it through steam wallet or apple card will make
it faster than through bank.but if you like you can can send it through
bank or western union I don't have problem with that.for the duration of
the ATM delivery,it will take 3 working days to get to your home.once you
have made the payment.
Sincerely,
Jimmy caleb

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
Hi Jimmy Caleb,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your suggestion about sending the payment through Steam Wallet or Apple Card to make it faster. However, I'm curious to know why using a bank transfer or Western Union would take longer. Can you please explain that to me?

Also, could you provide more details about the ATM and how many working days it would take for the payment to reach me? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the process.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ashley

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:

body:

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
Sending it through bank,the fee will take more time to be cleared to our
bank account but gift card will take just few minutes and everything about
the payment is settled.i have nothing to do with your home address, just a
place where your ATM will be delivered to you.and phone number is for easy
communication with the delivery agent to avoid wrong delivery.i think I
have explained this to you the way your should understand it.

Sincerely, Jimmy caleb

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
Hello Jimmy Caleb,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining the payment process to me. I appreciate your willingness to provide more information. I understand that using a gift card can expedite the payment process, but I have a few follow-up questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please clarify how using a gift card will ensure a faster clearance to our bank account? I want to make sure I fully understand the reasoning behind this.

2. Could you explain in more detail how the delivery agent will use my phone number to avoid any potential issues? I just want to be certain about the security measures in place.

3. Is there any specific reason why we cannot proceed with a traditional bank transfer? It's just that I'm more familiar with that method and would feel more comfortable using it.

Thank you again for your assistance, Jimmy Caleb. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ashley

subject: Re: Attention Please.
body:
I have explained all this for you and tired of explaining more.i told you

credit the money while gift card doesn't.why can't the agent who doesn't
know your home before need your home address for delivery?he has nothing
against you if not to do his job. more important,if what you need need is

provide the informations to you that is all.i don't like much stress in my

Jimmy caleb

body:
